title: DC and can't relog
body: Hi, it's been a couple of times now so i'm gonna write about it. I've been disconnected a few times from games, now this is not a problem but i can't relog back in. Again loosing the game and getting reported thanks to you guys :). Used the client tool repair and did not change anything ....

replies.body: If your network keeps getting disconnected from our servers, we may need to dig a little deeper and adjust some network settings since the hextech repair tool isn't able to fix those on its own. Troubleshoot some of your network settings by following the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but make sure to pay extra attention to port forwarding and how to configure your DNS settings.
